                                                     Path commonPropsPath,

                                              throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException,

        Load job configurations from job configuration files affected by changes to the given common properties file. From a general file system.
        Parameters:
        sysProps - Gobblin framework configuration properties
        commonPropsPath - the path of common properties file with changes
